name: Guns and Bounce
description:
Guns & Bounce is a very easy to play but hard to master game.

Your main goal is to blast as many balls as possible but to do that you have to place your guns in a strategic way.

Merge your guns to get better guns, merge balls to get more money per ball.
developers: Lagot Games Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
publishers: Lagot Games Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
